#summary How to add JType to your project.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Getting started =

== Maven ==

To start using JType in a [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven] project, add the following dependency to the POM:

{{{
<project>
    ...
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.googlecode.jtype</groupId>
            <artifactId>jtype</artifactId>
            <version>0.1.2</version>
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>
    ...
</project>
}}}

JType is deployed to [http://oss.sonatype.org/ Sonatype's OSS Repository] and synced with the [http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/ Maven Central Repository], so no repository definitions are required.
